item.title: Sage Skills
item.description: Sage Spells and Abilities Icon Action Level Type Cast Time Recast MP Cost Description Dosis 1 Spell 1.5s 2.5s 400 Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 300. Also restores HP to party members under the effect of your Kardion with a heal potency of 170. Diagnosis 2 Spell 1.5s 2.5s 400 Heals the target with a potency of 450.
